snippet: Merion, a grand old course with hidden challenges, will test if cutting-edge technology has subverted the basic challenges of the game at the United States Open.
abstract: Merion Golf Club, host of 2013 United States Open, is grand old course with hidden challenges but short by Open standards; course will test if cutting-edge technology has subverted basic challenges of the game.
lead_paragraph: Merion, a grand old course with hidden challenges, will test if cutting-edge technology has subverted the basic challenges of the game at the United States Open.

headline.seo: U.S. Open — Gambling With a Merion Course That’s Tough but Short
headline.main: U.S. Open’s Experiment: Today’s Golf Equipment vs. Tradition
headline.print_headline: Open’s Audacious Experiment: Today’s Equipment vs. Tradition
